trans-unit.source: Take a backup
trans-unit.target: Take a backup

trans-unit.source: Describes how to define a StorSimple backup policy.
trans-unit.target: Describes how to define a StorSimple backup policy.

trans-unit.source: To take a backup
trans-unit.target: To take a backup

trans-unit.source: On the device Quick Start page, click Add a backup policy.
trans-unit.target: On the device Quick Start page, click Add a backup policy.

trans-unit.source: This will start the Add Backup Policy wizard.
trans-unit.target: This will start the Add Backup Policy wizard.

trans-unit.source: On the Define your backup policy page:
trans-unit.target: On the Define your backup policy page:

trans-unit.source: Supply a name that contains between 3 and 150 characters for your backup policy.
trans-unit.target: Supply a name that contains between 3 and 150 characters for your backup policy.

trans-unit.source: Select the volumes to be backed up.
trans-unit.target: Select the volumes to be backed up.

trans-unit.source: If you select more than one volume, these volumes will be grouped together to create a crash-consistent backup.
trans-unit.target: If you select more than one volume, these volumes will be grouped together to create a crash-consistent backup.

trans-unit.source: Click the arrow icon <linkText>arrow-icon</linkText>.
trans-unit.target: Click the arrow icon <linkText>arrow-icon</linkText>.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Add-backup-policy</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Add-backup-policy</linkText>

trans-unit.source: On the Define a schedule page:
trans-unit.target: On the Define a schedule page:

trans-unit.source: Select the type of backup from the drop-down list.
trans-unit.target: Select the type of backup from the drop-down list.

trans-unit.source: For faster restores, select Local Snapshot.
trans-unit.target: For faster restores, select Local Snapshot.

trans-unit.source: For data resiliency, select Cloud Snapshot.
trans-unit.target: For data resiliency, select Cloud Snapshot.

trans-unit.source: Specify the backup frequency in minutes, hours, days, or weeks.
trans-unit.target: Specify the backup frequency in minutes, hours, days, or weeks.

trans-unit.source: Select a retention time.
trans-unit.target: Select a retention time.

trans-unit.source: The retention choices depend on the backup frequency.
trans-unit.target: The retention choices depend on the backup frequency.

trans-unit.source: For example, for a daily policy, the retention can be specified in weeks, whereas retention for a monthly policy is in months.
trans-unit.target: For example, for a daily policy, the retention can be specified in weeks, whereas retention for a monthly policy is in months.

trans-unit.source: Select the starting time and date for the backup policy.
trans-unit.target: Select the starting time and date for the backup policy.

trans-unit.source: Select the Enable check box to enable the backup policy.
trans-unit.target: Select the Enable check box to enable the backup policy.

trans-unit.source: Click the check icon <linkText>check-icon</linkText> to save the policy.
trans-unit.target: Click the check icon <linkText>check-icon</linkText> to save the policy.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Add-backup-policy</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Add-backup-policy</linkText>

trans-unit.source: You now have a backup policy that will create scheduled backups of your volume data.
trans-unit.target: You now have a backup policy that will create scheduled backups of your volume data.

trans-unit.source: You have completed the device configuration.
trans-unit.target: You have completed the device configuration.
